title.rendered: “IDF Forces’ Strategic Operations: Eliminating Terrorists and Locating Rocket Installations Across Gaza Strip”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

IDF forces continue to eliminate terrorists and locate weaponry throughout the Strip; warriors from the 401 brigade identified approximately 100 rocket installations.

In the Beit Lahiya area, warriors from the 401 brigade identified about 100 rocket installations and about 60 rockets ready for launch. The fighters eliminated dozens of terrorists during the battles.

In North Gaza, a cooperative operation between the Air Force and combat warriors of the 5th brigade, who guided aircraft and a combat helicopter, led to the elimination of nine terrorists.

In the Khan Yunis area, combat warriors of the 7th brigade guided several aircraft to eliminate terrorists identified in the area, as well as a combat helicopter that destroyed an observation post threatening our forces.

Also in the Khan Yunis area, combat warriors from the Paratroopers brigade identified an armed terrorist near the forces and eliminated him. Shortly thereafter, another terrorist was identified in the same building, who was also eliminated by tank fire of the combat team.

Attached is documentation of the rocket installations identified by the 401 brigade warriors: https://bit.ly/3Smhb0h

Attached is documentation of IDF attacks in the Gaza Strip: https://bit.ly/41WVCGF

Attached is documentation of IDF troops’ activities in the Gaza Strip: https://bit.ly/3vtRp0T

Attached are photos of IDF forces’ activities in the Gaza Strip: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC16012024.2321589489
